overview:
Hospitality and Travel technology entrepreneur and investor.

Doug joined Limos.com as SVP of Product and Corporate Development in March 2008. Like any most start-up execs, he has his hands in all aspects of the business. Primarily focused on business development, product development and operator relations.

He was most recently VP of Product Development for LesConcierges, a global private-label provider of luxury services to Fortune 500 clients including Bank of America, American Express, UBS, Nordstrom, Neiman Marcus and Fidelity Investments.

Doug was previously with Hotwire.com from 2001 to 2005, where started as a business analyst for one of Hotwire’s founders and went on to manage the Hotel and Package products. Prior to Hotwire, Doug was with Hilton Hotels where he focused on developing electronic distribution channels and developed the first distribution deal between Hilton and Expedia.

Doug is a graduate of The School of Hospitality Business at Michigan State University and a published author in the field of technology for the hospitality industry
